answers_data.content:
For the overflow from 
name
to 
command
to work, the difference between the addresses of both should be 0x10 bytes. I verified what I mentioned in the case earlier - Adding 
printf("%p:%p
", name, command);
Under a debugger stepping through main gives the addresses as 
0x100404080:0x1002059f0
Here delta > 0x10 bytes and hence the 
name
strcpy
would not overflow to 
command
while without stepping or without a debugger comes out 
0x7fa890405830:0x7fa890405840
exactly 0x10 bytes.
